mapper.select: SELECT shw_num, shw_movieNum, shw_movieName, shw_screenNum, shw_screenName, shw_date, shw_time, shw_seatCnt, shw_seatRow, shw_seatLine, shw_regDate, shw_expireFlag FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM tb_showinfo ORDER BY shw_num DESC) T) WHERE RNUM >= #{from} AND RNUM < (#{from} + #{pageRows})
